note: Go prefers short names. 'ID' should be uppercase (userID
Lowercase first letter to keep private.
Postgres folds unquoted names to lowercase. Avoid mixed case. Plural names preferred.
ORM maps this to camelCase in code automatically.
Simple 'id' is preferred over 'table_id' for primary key.
Foreign key usually explicitly names the referenced table (singular) + _id.
Matches JSON/BSON field style usually found in JS apps.
URLs should be lowercase and kebab-case. Plural nouns for resources.
GraphQL standard is camelCase for fields.
